38.eng-name: Chapters on the description of Paradise
38.ara-name: كتاب صفة الجنة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated from the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) that he said:"The people of Paradise are without body hair, Murd, with Kuhl(on their eyelids), their youth does not come to an end, and their clothes do not wear out

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صِفَةِ ثِيَابِ أَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related Concerning the Description of the Garments of the People of Paradise
